message: With this, A Bus Pirate, Logic Analyzer, Oscilloscope, Unused Smartphone and Datasheets could possibly advance our project in Leaps & Bounds http://m.engadget.com/default/article.do?artUrl=http://www.engadget.com/2011/06/08/aiken-labs-brings-9-axis-modular-motion-sensing-to-android-we-g/&category=classic&postPage=1
